posts.post_content:
For the love of Richard Garfield! Can't we stop hearing about "Fastbond + Crucible of Worlds + Whatever" combos already? They've been established, they're decent, they're totally uncreative at this point, they've been beat to death and Fastbond is banned in Legacy.   
  
  
How about we talk about using the Orb in, I don't know, a Prosbloom-esque mill deck alongside [Planar Birth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Planar Birth), [Hedron Crab](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hedron Crab), [Natural Balance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Natural Balance), [Scapeshift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scapeshift), [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra) and [Squandered Resources](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Squandered Resources)?
